title: POCO C3 (Arctic Blue, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Power Adapter, Micro USB Cable, SIM Ejector Tool, User Guide and Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 20:9 Aspect Ratio, Panda Glass Screen Protection, 1500:1 Contrast Ratio, 70.8% NTSC Ratio
product_specification.Operating Frequency: GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G FDD LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD LTE: B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + 2MP + 2MP Rear Camera Setup, Primary (13MP, f/2.2, 1.0μm) + Micro (2MP, FF, 1.75μm) + Potrait (2MP, FF, 1.75μm), Phase Detection Auto Focus, HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Face Recognition, AI Scene Detection
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 5MP Front Camera, f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12μm Pixel Size, Face Recognition, HDR, AI Portrait Mode, Screen Flash, Selfie Timer, Portrait Selfies, Palm Shutter
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer
product_specification.Other Features: Face Unlock, Dual App Support, 10W Charger, Screen Mirror/Cast
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Get Clicking: Equipped with a triple-camera setup (13 MP + 2 MP + 2 MP) in the rear, this POCO phone helps capture all your favourite moments without any hassle. It even has AI Scene Detection to help take your photography skills up a notch. It also has a 5 MP front camera to take care of your selfie needs.
product_description.Blazing-fast Performance: This smartphone packs a MediaTek Helio G35 Octa-core processor and up to 4 GB of RAM, so you can use it to do a bunch of different tasks, from gaming to making business presentations, with the utmost ease.
product_description.HyperEngine Game Technology: Thanks to this innovative technology, you get to indulge in lag-free mobile gaming sessions whenever you want.
product_description.Power-packed Battery: It boasts a 5000-mAh battery that you can take advantage of to enjoy up to 586 hours of standby time, 37 hours of VoLTE calling, 95 hours of music playback, 31 hours of video playback, or up to 14 hours of non-stop gaming on a single full charge. Additionally, Better Battery 2.0 ensures that the battery has about 25% more lifespan than the ordinary ones.
product_description.Seamless Display: This handset’s stunning 16.58-centimetre (6.53) HD+ Display makes your favourite movies, TV shows, and videos a treat to watch.
product_description.Additional Features: This phone from POCO also has TUV Rheinland Reading Mode Certification, P2i Barrier, corrosion-proof ports, and a 380 V surge protection charger that make it all the more worthy.
product_description.User-friendly: This smartphone also boasts an optimized launcher and responsive animations that make it fun, convenient, and hassle-free to use.
